Name: Raincoat
Description: My hair is beautiful and dry.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Mi cabello es hermoso y seco.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Meine Haare sind schön und trocken.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Mes cheveux sont beaux et secs.
DescriptionLocalization.it: I miei capelli sono belli e asciutti.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 私の髪は美しくて乾いています。
